string.name: 1/intro
string.value: This application can launch applications that you are subscribed to.

string.name: 1/appear
string.value: Applications are categorized in each groups and by clicking on the category name, the list of applications appear.

string.name: 1/run
string.value: By clicking on the application name, the application will be launched. Click the name again to close the application window.

string.name: 2/logout
string.value: To log out, click on the 'Logout' link at the bottom to discard the user session and go back to the log in screen.
